document.full_text: pakistan denied media reports on wednesday that it was lobbying afghanistan to drop its alliance with washington and look to islamabad and beijing to forge a peace deal with the taliban and rebuild its economy.
document.title: pakistan denies reports of efforts to split u.s., afghanistan
lines_and_colors: pakistan denied media reports on wednesday that it was lobbying afghanistan to drop its alliance with washington and look to islamabad and beijing to forge a peace deal with the taliban and rebuild its economy.
